awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Miles buys himself a state-of-the-art computer that starts expressing thoughts and emotions after a having champagne spilled down on him. Things start getting out of hand when both Miles and Edgar, how the computer calls himself, fall in love with Madeline, an attractive neighbour.
plot: An artificially intelligent PC and his human owner find themselves in a romantic rivalry over a woman.
title: Electric Dreams
